column4: is there something special I have to do to get AE support on Ubuntu/PPC ? There some FAQ I missed about what I need to do?
I have 6.06 and it just fails to load the module complaining about firmware
AE is unsupported /Apple will not release any specs, so no-one can actually write a driver for it./ http://www.ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=862
I remember reading that there now was a driver for it
